H0.text: What is the currency of Israel. Israeli Pound

H1.text: What is the currency of Israel. New Israeli Dollar

H2.text: What is the currency of Israel. Israeli Dinar

H3.text: What is the currency of Israel. SheK.

A4.text: The Israeli pound was the currency of Israel from June 1952 until it was replaced with the shekel on 24 February 1980.

A5.text: The new shekel has been in use since 1 January 1986, when it replaced the hyperinflated old shekel at a ratio of 1000:1.
